item.title: These top dividend stock picks can help power your portfolio higher, says investor Kevin Simpson
item.description: Investors looking to earn income and keep pace with inflation should turn to dividend-growth stocks, according to investor Kevin Simpson.

item.title: This biotech made it through a 'time correction.' The charts say it could be time to buy
item.description: David Keller breaks down the charts on Incyte Corp.

item.title: Intel earnings are out Thursday. What Wall Street is expecting to see
item.description: The barrage of investments into Intel have quickly hiked its market cap, but largely failed to lift analysts' conviction on the stock longer term.

item.title: IBM is trying to rebound after results disappointed initially. What analysts and investors are saying
item.description: Analysts remain largely divided on the future of the tech stalwart.

item.title: The Beyond Meat fever highlights the risk of trying to ride the meme trade wave
item.description: The violent swings underscored how quickly euphoria can turn to panic in these momentum-fueled trades.
